Event.name: Mention
Event.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Communicator</fen> or <fen>Medium</fen> briefly references something in a <fen>Message</fen>, in which only a subpart of the full content is profiled.
<ex><fex name="Communicator">The General Secretary</fex> <t>mentions</t> <fex name="Specified_content">some of them</fex> <fex name="Medium">in his report</fex>.</ex>
<ex><fex name="Medium">The Queen 's Speech</fex> also <t>mentions</t> <fex name="Message">the importance of making sure that Iraq complies with United Nations resolutions</fex>.</ex>
<ex> When <fex name="Specified_content">Barack Obama's name</fex> was <t>mentioned</t>, boos filled the room. <fex name="Communicator">CNI</fex></ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Communicator
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The person who uses language in the written or spoken modality to convey a <fen>Message</fen> to another person.
<ex><fex name="Communicator">Her father</fex> never <t>mentioned</t> it.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Addressee
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Addressee</fen> receives a <fen>Message</fen> from the <fen>Communicator</fen>.
<ex>I <t>mentioned</t> it <fex name="Addressee">to him</fex> in direct terms.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Message
Arg.definition:
<def-root> A proposition or set of propositions that the <fen>Communicator</fen> wants the <fen>Addressee</fen> to believe or take for granted.
<ex>A CBS report did <t>mention</t> <fex name="Message">that the First Lady was required to wear a flak jacket for her safety</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Medium
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The physical or abstract setting in which the <fen>Message</fen> is conveyed.
<ex><fex name="Medium">The report</fex> also <t>mentioned</t> contamination problems during the manufacture.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Communicator</fen> communicates.
<ex>Her mother <t>mentioned</t> <fex name="Manner">casually</fex> that Parr had gone to Belfast.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Duration</fen> is the length of time during which the communication takes place.</def-root>

Arg.name: Iterations
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The number of times the <fen>Message</fen> is mentioned by the <fen>Communicator</fen>.
<ex>I <t>mentioned</t> it <fex name="Iterations">fourteen times</fex> and it still wasn't enough.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Particular_iteration
Arg.definition: <def-root>Expressions marked with this extra-thematic FE modify a non-iterative use of the target, and indicate that it is conceived as embedded within an iterated series of similar events or states. In addition, most expressions of Particular_iteration indicate which instance of the series is being referred to.</def-root>

Arg.name: Specified_content
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The relevant entity or state-of-affairs that the <fen>Communicator</fen> mentions.
<ex>If someone <t>mentions</t> <fex name="Specified_content">things like ration books</fex> , my stomach turns.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Containing_event
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE denotes an event that occurs or state of affairs that holds at a time that includes the time during which the event or state of affairs reported by the target occurs and of which it is taken to be a part.</def-root>

Arg.name: Circumstances
Arg.definition: <def-root>The state of the world when the <fen>Communicator</fen> mentions the Message or <fen>Specified_content</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>The purpose for which the <fen>Communicator</fen> mentions the <fen>Specified_content</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: mention.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to refer to something without going into detail

lexUnit.name: touch (on).v
lexUnit.definition: FN: (with on) mention, but not as a main topic.
